event.title: was founded by the ecclesiastical authorities on April 30, 1757

data.event: Abulacan was founded by the ecclesiastical authorities on April 30, 1757 with San Juan Nepomuceno as the patron saint.
Sometime in 1842, Vicar Pedro Montenegro, O.P. convinced the people to unite the two towns.
This is the reason why the town fiesta is celebrated for two days and the images of the two patron saints are carried during religious processions.
The town fiesta is celebrated every April 29.

event.title: 1919, some of the prominent people of Pamplona recommended

data.event: In 1919, some of the prominent people of Pamplona recommended the transfer of the same to Bidduang, a barrio of Pamplona.
The transfer was made on November 16, 1919, during the administration of municipal president Esteban Meneses by order of General Wood.
